oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "No Bitterness, Only Pity"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Willis, A. W., Jr.; Loeb, Henry; politics;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A newspaper article covering a statement from A. W. Willis regarding the rescindment of his appointment to the Memphis Transit Authority under political pressure from Mayor Loeb.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Sally Lineback
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: photocopy of newspaper clipping, 11 x 8.5 in.
